Password requirements for Starbucks

A visual helper for the 5 requirements needed for a Starbucks password on their website and mobile app.

Original Reference Report Issue

Requirements

From 8 to 25 characters

At least one number

At least one capital letter

At least one lowercase letter

At least one special character such as exclamation point or comma

Additional Info

You cannot use any other password you've used before. If you try to, it won't let you continue and will throw an error.
